Class PricePlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • PricePlot
  • public class PricePlot
extends Entity
    Price plot entity on top of the screen. Shows the current value and the history of the hitcoin price. It holds the prices as a linked list and updates the linked list on each update.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Common common

      int height  
      private java.util.Random random  
      int width

      Constructors

      Initializes the data with random values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws lines between the current and the previous elemnt of the linked list to create a line graph.
      int getLastValue()
      Gets the current value of the hitcoin.
      int getNextValue​(int current)
      Creates a new random value depending on the current value of the hitcoin.
      int getPriceAt​(int index)
      Returns the value of the hitcoin at a given time in the stored history.
      void update()
      Removes the first element of the linked list and generates a new value and places it to the end.
